title: What Is He Doing In That Bathroom All Day
itunes:title: What Is He Doing In That Bathroom All Day
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I'm a 27 year old man and my best friend is causing issues at my job. I recently got him a job with me after he was fired from his last job because of Covid-19. It was going really good until my co-workers began asking me if something is wrong with him, because he disappears a lot during his work shift. I kept an eye out for him and noticed that two times during a shift I couldn't find him for about 30 minutes.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

It was going really good until my co-workers began asking me if something is wrong with him, because he disappears a lot during his work shift. I kept an eye out for him and noticed that two times during a shift I couldn't find him for about 30 minutes.................
